attributes.action: Now that the UK is independent from the EU re-look at decriminalising Cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
Also making it available for sale with push the cannabis users away from harder drugs such as 
Cocaine, mdma and heroin
attributes.background: Re look at legalising cannabis sale or at least decriminalising it so it's available for sale and tax it to help creat thousands of new jobs and boost are economy massively as every piece of data for legalising cannabis shows what an economical boost it has had such as Colorado and Amstersam.
